Abra.name: Abra
Abra.desc: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.

Aerodactyl.name: Aerodactyl
Aerodactyl.desc: A ferocious, pre­ historic POKéMON that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.

Alakazam.name: Alakazam
Alakazam.desc: Its brain can out­ perform a super­ computer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.

Arbok.name: Arbok
Arbok.desc: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

Arcanine.name: Arcanine
Arcanine.desc: A POKéMON that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

Articuno.name: Articuno
Articuno.desc: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

Beedrill.name: Beedrill
Beedrill.desc: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

Bellsprout.name: Bellsprout
Bellsprout.desc: A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.

Blastoise.name: Blastoise
Blastoise.desc: A brutal POKéMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.

Bulbasaur.name: Bulbasaur
Bulbasaur.desc: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.

Butterfree.name: Butterfree
Butterfree.desc: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

Caterpie.name: Caterpie
Caterpie.desc: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

Chansey.name: Chansey
Chansey.desc: A rare and elusive POKéMON that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to get it.

Charizard.name: Charizard
Charizard.desc: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

Charmander.name: Charmander
Charmander.desc: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

Charmeleon.name: Charmeleon
Charmeleon.desc: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

Clefable.name: Clefable
Clefable.desc: A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.

Clefairy.name: Clefairy
Clefairy.desc: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

Cloyster.name: Cloyster
Cloyster.desc: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.

Cubone.name: Cubone
Cubone.desc: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this POKéMON's real face.

Dewgong.name: Dewgong
Dewgong.desc: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.

Diglett.name: Diglett
Diglett.desc: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

Ditto.name: Ditto
Ditto.desc: Capable of copying an enemy's genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.

Dodrio.name: Dodrio
Dodrio.desc: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

Doduo.name: Doduo
Doduo.desc: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.

Dragonair.name: Dragonair
Dragonair.desc: A mystical POKéMON that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.

Dragonite.name: Dragonite
Dragonite.desc: An extremely rarely seen marine POKéMON. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.

Dratini.name: Dratini
Dratini.desc: Long considered a mythical POKéMON until recently when a small colony was found living underwater.

Drowzee.name: Drowzee
Drowzee.desc: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.

Dugtrio.name: Dugtrio
Dugtrio.desc: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

Eevee.name: Eevee
Eevee.desc: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.

Ekans.name: Ekans
Ekans.desc: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.

Electabuzz.name: Electabuzz
Electabuzz.desc: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.

Electrode.name: Electrode
Electrode.desc: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.

Exeggcute.name: Exeggcute
Exeggcute.desc: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.

Exeggutor.name: Exeggutor
Exeggutor.desc: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.

Farfetchd.name: Farfetchd
Farfetchd.desc: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.

Fearow.name: Fearow
Fearow.desc: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

Flareon.name: Flareon
Flareon.desc: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.

Gastly.name: Gastly
Gastly.desc: Almost invisible, this gaseous POKéMON cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

Gengar.name: Gengar
Gengar.desc: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

Geodude.name: Geodude
Geodude.desc: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

Gloom.name: Gloom
Gloom.desc: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

Golbat.name: Golbat
Golbat.desc: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

Goldeen.name: Goldeen
Goldeen.desc: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of the Water Queen.

Golduck.name: Golduck
Golduck.desc: Often seen swim­ ming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

Golem.name: Golem
Golem.desc: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.

Graveler.name: Graveler
Graveler.desc: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

Grimer.name: Grimer
Grimer.desc: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

Growlithe.name: Growlithe
Growlithe.desc: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

Gyarados.name: Gyarados
Gyarados.desc: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

Haunter.name: Haunter
Haunter.desc: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from an­ other dimension.

Hitmonchan.name: Hitmonchan
Hitmonchan.desc: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.

Hitmonlee.name: Hitmonlee
Hitmonlee.desc: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra long, loping strides.

Horsea.name: Horsea
Horsea.desc: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.

Hypno.name: Hypno
Hypno.desc: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS and CONFUSION.

Ivysaur.name: Ivysaur
Ivysaur.desc: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

Jigglypuff.name: Jigglypuff
Jigglypuff.desc: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

Jolteon.name: Jolteon
Jolteon.desc: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10000- volt lightning bolts.

Jynx.name: Jynx
Jynx.desc: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.

Kabuto.name: Kabuto
Kabuto.desc: A POKéMON that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor eons ago.

Kabutops.name: Kabutops
Kabutops.desc: Its sleek shape is perfect for swim­ ming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.

Kadabra.name: Kadabra
Kadabra.desc: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.

Kakuna.name: Kakuna
Kakuna.desc: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

Kangaskhan.name: Kangaskhan
Kangaskhan.desc: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective pouch until it is 3 years old.

Kingler.name: Kingler
Kingler.desc: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.

Koffing.name: Koffing
Koffing.desc: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.

Krabby.name: Krabby
Krabby.desc: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.

Lapras.name: Lapras
Lapras.desc: A POKéMON that has been over­ hunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.

Lickitung.name: Lickitung
Lickitung.desc: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.

Machamp.name: Machamp
Machamp.desc: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.

Machoke.name: Machoke
Machoke.desc: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

Machop.name: Machop
Machop.desc: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

Magikarp.name: Magikarp
Magikarp.desc: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

Magmar.name: Magmar
Magmar.desc: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.

Magnemite.name: Magnemite
Magnemite.desc: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.

Magneton.name: Magneton
Magneton.desc: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

Mankey.name: Mankey
Mankey.desc: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

Marowak.name: Marowak
Marowak.desc: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

Meowth.name: Meowth
Meowth.desc: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

Metapod.name: Metapod
Metapod.desc: This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

Mew.name: Mew
Mew.desc: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.

Mewtwo.name: Mewtwo
Mewtwo.desc: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

Moltres.name: Moltres
Moltres.desc: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flash of flames.

Mr-Mime.name: Mr-Mime
Mr-Mime.desc: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.

Muk.name: Muk
Muk.desc: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

Nidoking.name: Nidoking
Nidoking.desc: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.

Nidoqueen.name: Nidoqueen
Nidoqueen.desc: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.

Nidoran-F.name: Nidoran-F
Nidoran-F.desc: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

Nidoran-M.name: Nidoran-M
Nidoran-M.desc: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.

Nidorina.name: Nidorina
Nidorina.desc: The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.

Nidorino.name: Nidorino
Nidorino.desc: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

Ninetales.name: Ninetales
Ninetales.desc: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.

Oddish.name: Oddish
Oddish.desc: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

Omanyte.name: Omanyte
Omanyte.desc: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.

Omastar.name: Omastar
Omastar.desc: A prehistoric POKéMON that died out when its heavy shell made it impossible to catch prey.

Onix.name: Onix
Onix.desc: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.

Paras.name: Paras
Paras.desc: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by draw­ ing nutrients from the bug host.

Parasect.name: Parasect
Parasect.desc: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.

Persian.name: Persian
Persian.desc: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

Pidgeot.name: Pidgeot
Pidgeot.desc: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.

Pidgeotto.name: Pidgeotto
Pidgeotto.desc: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.

Pidgey.name: Pidgey
Pidgey.desc: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

Pikachu.name: Pikachu
Pikachu.desc: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

Pinsir.name: Pinsir
Pinsir.desc: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.

Poliwag.name: Poliwag
Poliwag.desc: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.

Poliwhirl.name: Poliwhirl
Poliwhirl.desc: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

Poliwrath.name: Poliwrath
Poliwrath.desc: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

Ponyta.name: Ponyta
Ponyta.desc: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.

Porygon.name: Porygon
Porygon.desc: A POKéMON that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

Primeape.name: Primeape
Primeape.desc: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.

Psyduck.name: Psyduck
Psyduck.desc: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.

Raichu.name: Raichu
Raichu.desc: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.

Rapidash.name: Rapidash
Rapidash.desc: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

Raticate.name: Raticate
Raticate.desc: It uses its whis­ kers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.

Rattata.name: Rattata
Rattata.desc: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

Rhydon.name: Rhydon
Rhydon.desc: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.

Rhyhorn.name: Rhyhorn
Rhyhorn.desc: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.

Sandshrew.name: Sandshrew
Sandshrew.desc: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

Sandslash.name: Sandslash
Sandslash.desc: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

Scyther.name: Scyther
Scyther.desc: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.

Seadra.name: Seadra
Seadra.desc: Capable of swim­ ming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-like pectoral fins and stout tail.

Seaking.name: Seaking
Seaking.desc: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming power­ fully up rivers and creeks.

Seel.name: Seel
Seel.desc: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.

Shellder.name: Shellder
Shellder.desc: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

Slowbro.name: Slowbro
Slowbro.desc: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.

Slowpoke.name: Slowpoke
Slowpoke.desc: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

Snorlax.name: Snorlax
Snorlax.desc: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

Spearow.name: Spearow
Spearow.desc: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.

Squirtle.name: Squirtle
Squirtle.desc: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

Starmie.name: Starmie
Starmie.desc: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.

Staryu.name: Staryu
Staryu.desc: An enigmatic POKéMON that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.

Tangela.name: Tangela
Tangela.desc: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to sea­ weed. Its vines shake as it walks.

Tauros.name: Tauros
Tauros.desc: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.

Tentacool.name: Tentacool
Tentacool.desc: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

Tentacruel.name: Tentacruel
Tentacruel.desc: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

Vaporeon.name: Vaporeon
Vaporeon.desc: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

Venomoth.name: Venomoth
Venomoth.desc: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

Venonat.name: Venonat
Venonat.desc: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.

Venusaur.name: Venusaur
Venusaur.desc: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

Victreebel.name: Victreebel
Victreebel.desc: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

Vileplume.name: Vileplume
Vileplume.desc: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

Voltorb.name: Voltorb
Voltorb.desc: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, they have zapped many people.

Vulpix.name: Vulpix
Vulpix.desc: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

Wartortle.name: Wartortle
Wartortle.desc: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

Weedle.name: Weedle
Weedle.desc: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

Weepinbell.name: Weepinbell
Weepinbell.desc: It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of ACID.

Weezing.name: Weezing
Weezing.desc: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.

Wigglytuff.name: Wigglytuff
Wigglytuff.desc: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

Zapdos.name: Zapdos
Zapdos.desc: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

Zubat.name: Zubat
Zubat.desc: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.
